[[Version 1.2]]
*The description for Amos' Bow's effect was changed.
**{{Color|Old description:}} Increases Normal Attack and <span class="bg-highlight">Aimed Shot</span> DMG by 12%. <span class="bg-highlight">Increases DMG by 8% for every 0.1s that an arrow is in flight. Stacks up to 5 times on each arrow.</span>
**{{Color|New description:}} Increases Normal and <span class="bg-highlight">Charged Attack</span> DMG by 12%. <span class="bg-highlight">After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 8% every 0.1s up to 5 times.</span>
